languages.text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан, невзирая на свой бесконечно высокий статус приближенного слуги Лорд-капитана, лично возглавил матросов и направился с ними в оружейные отсеки для помощи техножрецам в тушении пожаров. Проявив доблесть и мудрость, свойственную истинным аристократам Империума, он одержал верх над жадным пламенем.

traits.locale_text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан, невзирая на свой бесконечно высокий статус приближенного слуги Лорда-Капитана, лично направился с бригадой матросов на тушение пожаров в оружейных отсеках. Проявив доблесть и мудрость, свойственную истинным аристократам Империума, он одержал верх над жадным пламенем и уберег левый борт от страшных повреждений, которые могли причинить взрывы снарядов главного калибра.

languages.text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.
languages.original_text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан, невзирая на свой бесконечно высокий статус приближенного слуги Лорд-капитана, лично возглавил матросов и направился с ними в оружейные отсеки для помощи техножрецам в тушении пожаров. Проявив доблесть и мудрость, свойственную истинным аристократам Империума, он одержал верх над жадным пламенем.

traits.locale_text: The honorable Abelard Verserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally set off for the weapons bays to oversee the firefighting efforts. Displaying the valor and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames and saved the port side from the serious damage that could have been caused had the large-caliber shells exploded.

The honorable Abelard Verserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally set off for the weapons bays to oversee the firefighting efforts. Displaying the valor and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames and saved the port side from the serious damage that could have been caused had the large-caliber shells exploded.

The honorable Abelard Verserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally set off for the weapons bays to oversee the firefighting efforts. Displaying the valor and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames and saved the port side from the serious damage that could have been caused had the large-caliber shells exploded.

The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

languages.text: El honorable Abelard Werserian, negándose a aprovecharse de su estatus de sirviente de alto rango de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, acudió personalmente a las bahías de armamento para asistir a los tecnosacerdotes en los esfuerzos de extinción. Haciendo gala del valor y la sabiduría característicos de los nobles del Imperium, hizo frente a las voraces llamas y las derrotó.
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

traits.locale_text: El honorable Abelard Werserian, negándose a aprovecharse de su estatus de sirviente de alto rango de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, acudió personalmente a las bahías de armamento para supervisar los esfuerzos de extinción. Haciendo gala del valor y la sabiduría característica de los nobles del Imperium, hizo frente a las llamas y salvó el lado de babor de los graves daños que la explosión de la munición de gran calibre habría provocado.

languages.text: 尽管可敬的阿贝拉德·韦尔森身为舰长大人的近侍，拥有无比崇高的地位，但他依然亲自带领一群船员前往武器库，协助技术神甫进行灭火工作。他击退了贪婪的烈焰，展示了真正的帝国贵族所拥有的勇气与智慧。
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

traits.locale_text: 尽管可敬的阿贝拉德·韦尔森身为舰长大人的近侍，拥有无比崇高的地位，但他依然亲自前往武器库监督灭火工作。他击退了贪婪的烈焰，没有让左舷的大口径炮弹发生爆炸，从而让舰船免遭严重破坏。他展示了真正的帝国贵族所拥有的勇气与智慧。

languages.text: Der ehrenwerte Abelard Werserian führte ohne Rücksicht auf seinen unendlich hohen Status als enger Diener des Lord Captains persönlich einen Trupp Raumfahrer zu den Waffenkammern, um die Tech-Priester bei ihren Löscharbeiten zu unterstützen. Mit der Tapferkeit und Weisheit, die wahren Adligen des Imperiums eigen ist, besiegte er die gefräßigen Flammen.
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

languages.text: L'honorable Abélard Werserian, en dépit de son statut privilégié de proche serviteur {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, s'est rendu en personne à l'arsenal à la tête d'une escouade de cosmomarins pour aider les technoprêtres à lutter contre les incendies. Fort de la bravoure et de la sagesse inhérentes aux vrais nobles de l'Imperium, il a triomphé des flammes dévorantes.
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

traits.locale_text: L'honorable Abélard Werserian, en dépit de son statut privilégié de proche serviteur {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, s'est rendu en personne à l'arsenal pour superviser la lutte contre les incendies. Avec la vaillance et la sagesse propres aux véritables nobles de l'Imperium, il a vaincu le brasier vorace et a épargné le côté bâbord des graves avaries qu'aurait pu causer l'explosion des obus de gros calibre.

languages.text: 称賛に値するアベラード・ウェルザリアンは、ロード・キャプテンの側近という非常に高い地位などものともせず、自らヴォイズマンのクルーの先頭に立って兵器ベイへ赴き、技術司祭の消火活動を手伝った。帝国の真の貴族が元来持つ勇敢さと知恵を発揮し、彼は燃え盛る炎に打ち勝ったのだ。
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

traits.locale_text: 称賛に値するアベラード・ウェルザリアンは、ロード・キャプテンの側近という非常に高い地位などものともせず、自らヴォイズマンのクルーの先頭に立って兵器ベイへ赴き、技術司祭の消火活動を手伝った。帝国の真の貴族が元来持つ勇敢さと知恵を発揮し、彼は燃え盛る炎に打ち勝ったのだ。

languages.text: Şerefli Abelard Werserian, Lord Kaptan'ın yakın hizmetkârlarından olmasının getirdiği muazzam yüksek statüsüne bakmaksızın, Tekno Rahiplerin yangın söndürme çabalarına destek olmaları için uçsuz erlerinden oluşan bir ekibi silah bölmelerine bizzat götürdü. İmparatorluk'un gerçek soylularına yaraşır bir yiğitlik ve bilgelik sergileyerek, önüne çıkan her şeyi yutan alevleri alt etmeyi başardı.
languages.original_text: The honourable Abelard Werserian, with no regard for his infinitely high status as a close servant of the Lord Captain, personally led a crew of voidsmen to the weapons bays to assist the Tech-Priests in their firefighting efforts. Displaying the valour and wisdom intrinsic to true nobles of the Imperium, he defeated the ravenous flames.

traits.locale_text: Onurlu Abelard Werserian, Lord Kaptan'ın yakın hizmetkârlarından olmasının getirdiği muazzam yüksek statüsüne bakmaksızın, Tekno Rahiplerin yangın söndürme çabalarına destek olmaları için uçsuz erlerinden oluşan bir ekibi silah bölümlerine bizzat götürdü. İmparatorluk'un gerçek soylularına yakışan bir yiğitlik ve bilgelik sergileyerek, önüne çıkan her şeyi yutan alevleri alt etmeyi başardı.
